caller_intent: The caller wants to update his personal auto insurance policy and request a declaration form for his commercial property insurance.
resolution_steps: Agent asked clarifying questions about policy types (commercial vs. personal).
Caller confirmed he was updating a personal auto policy and needed a commercial property declaration.
Agent acknowledged the request and offered to transfer to a specialist for further assistance.
knowledge_required: Differentiating between personal and commercial insurance policies
Understanding documentation requirements for policy updates
summary: Nick Patillo contacted Alliance Insurance to update his personal auto policy and request a commercial property declaration. The agent clarified policy types and offered to transfer him to a specialist. The call remains open with further assistance pending.
